name: Spear of Shojin
desc: After first casting their spell, the holder's basic attacks restore 18% of their maximum mana on-hit

name: Statikk Shiv
desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 90 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies.

name: Frozen Heart
desc: Angrenzende Gegner verlieren 50% Angriffstempo. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

name: Chalice of Power
desc: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30 AP for 20 seconds.

name: Dragon's Claw
desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%

name: Luden's Echo
desc: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

name: Thief's Gloves
desc: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

name: Spatula
attrs: You will get a special ability

name: Blade of the Ruined King
desc: Wearer is also a Blademaster

name: Infiltrator's Talons
desc: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

name: Rebel Medal
desc: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

name: Celestial Orb
desc: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

name: BattlecastArmor
desc: The wearer gains the Battlecast trait.

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Wearer revives with 400 HP

name: Star Guardian's Charm
desc: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.

name: Deathblade
desc: Contributing to a kill grants +25 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 2).

name: Titan’s Resolve
desc: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: BlueSentinel
desc: [Unique] Sets holder's mana to 20 after each cast.

name: Protector's Chestguard
desc: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

name: Hextech Gunblade
desc: 45% healing from spell damage.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
desc: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
desc: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 275 / 350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

name: Bramble Vest
desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

name: Ionic Spark
desc: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

name: Force of Nature
desc: Gain +1 team size

name: Zeke's Herald
desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
desc: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

name: Red Buff
desc: Gains 10% max hp true damage over 4 seconds on hit in addition to its burn. And reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Zephyr
desc: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Morellonomicon
desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Giant Slayer
desc: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 20% bonus true damage. if the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
desc: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%

name: Redemption
desc: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

name: Bloodthirster
desc: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 45% of the damage dealt.

name: Infinity Edge
desc: [Unique] The holder gains 20% bonus critical strike damage, and 100% critical hit chance.

name: Last Whisper
desc: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack

name: Shroud of Stillness
desc: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

name: Quicksilver
desc: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
desc: Holder’s spells can crit and holder gains +30% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Hand of Justice
desc: At the begining of Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit

name: Runaan's Hurricane
desc: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Trap Claw
desc: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

name: Rapid Firecannon
desc: +200% Range and holder’s attacks can’t miss.

name: Sword Breaker
desc: 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

name: Warmog's Armor
desc: +600 Additional Health.

name: Dark Star's Heart
desc: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait.
